sentences.en: During the rut, the male deer can be very irritable.
sentences.cn: 在发情期间, 公鹿可能很易怒.

sentences.en: I don't like being in a rut – I like to keep moving on.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢一成不变–我喜欢不断前进。

sentences.en: I don't like being in a rut — I like to keep moving on.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢一成不变的生活——我喜欢不断进取。

sentences.en: I gave up my job because I felt I was stuck in a rut .
sentences.cn: 我放弃了我的工作，因为我觉得那种生活呆板无聊。

sentences.en: I've always wanted to do something really serious - something to shake me out of the rut.
sentences.cn: 我常想做一些正经的严肃的事,我要求一些事来给我一下刺激!

sentences.en: Many home sellers remain stuck in a recessional rut.
sentences.cn: 许多房屋的卖主仍然陷在经济衰退的困境中。

sentences.en: Many over 30s feel stuck in a financial rut.
sentences.cn: 很多超过30岁的人都觉得自己的经济状况很难有所改变。

sentences.en: Mark : It depends, rut it usually takes about two or three hoours.
sentences.cn: 马克: 这要看情况, 通常两、三个小时.

sentences.en: Pathophysiology and RUT of the other 4 patients with dpm 300 1000 were all negative.
sentences.cn: 其余4例dpm300～1000病理组织学与RUT均为阴性.

sentences.en: The car took a lurch forward but grounded in a deep rut.
sentences.cn: 车子猛地向前动了一下，但是随后就陷在一条深深的车辙里了。

sentences.en: The detective followed the rut made by the jeep.
sentences.cn: 侦探追寻着吉普留下的车辙痕迹.

sentences.en: The horse stumbled in a rut, then swerved aside and broke into a gallop.
sentences.cn: 马在沟里颠簸了一下, 接着歪到一边,飞跑起来.

sentences.en: TIME : Why did Bollywood stay in the same rut for so long?
sentences.cn: 为什么宝莱坞的电影的风格保持的如此长久?

sentences.en: What I dread is to get into a rut. One yearns for freshness of thought and ideas.
sentences.cn: 我害怕的就是墨守成规. 人总是向往新思想和新观念的.

sentences.en: When you feel stuck in a rut, it is time for you to upgrade your skills.
sentences.cn: 感觉自己停滞不前的时候就是应该技术更新的时候.

sentences.en: You mustn't let yourself get into a rut.

words.tran_cn: 形成车辙；挖槽（rut的过去式）
[动]发情期；惯例；性冲动；[建]凹槽

trans.tran_cn: 车辙，发情期，老一套，惯例
trans.tran_en: a deep narrow track left in soft ground by a wheel
to make a rut or ruts in
